data.title: 97 Things Every Engineering Manager Should Know: Collective Wisdom from the Experts [1 ed.] 1492050903, 9781492050902
data.meta_description: Tap into the wisdom of experts to learn what every engineering manager should know. With 97 short and extremely useful t...
